'''Beta 1.1_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on December 22, 2010,<ref>{{twon|2415520196|Updated Client and Server to Beta 1.1_01|December 22, 2010}}</ref> which fixed the font file being missing from [[Beta 1.1]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Font file'''
* Added the missing font file in the package build.
